name: Vizaport AI Chat – GPT text, audio and visual bots
author: Vizaport

sections.installation:
1. Navigate to your WordPress dashboard and go to the Plugins page.
  2. Click on “Add New” at the top of the page.
  3. Search for “Vizaport AI Chat” using the search bar on the right side.
  4. Click “Install Now” to install the plugin.
  5. After installation, click “Activate” to enable the plugin on your site.
sections.faq:
How does your AI work?

Our AI engine is built on OpenAI, which is the platform for ChatGPT. By default, our AI engine can answer customer questions using public internet data. For increased accuracy, simply load documentation (e.g., pre-sales, operations, support) that your internal teams already use to answer questions. Vizaport will leverage your documents to train the AI engine to provide accurate answers. Note this requires an upgrade.

How do I install the widget on my web site?

It’s simple. After configuration, just click the Add Widget button in your Vizaport Settings.

How do I train the AI for my products and services?

First, please note that this requires an upgrade. Then, you will be guided through the steps to load documents and web pages to train the AI on your products and services. You can upload various types of structured data (spreadsheets, XML) or unstructured data (documents, PDFs). There are step-by-step instructions to train the AI, preview your widget and then install on your web site.
sections.changelog:
1.1.1

  • Nonce support.

1.1

  • New chat widget UI. Fixes for WordPress.

1.0.2

  • Handling clickable link text for various types of links.

1.0.1

  • Resolved issues for WordPress submission.

1.0

  • Initial WordPress version.
sections.description:
Get started with a simple AI chatbot and then customize the AI to intelligently answers questions about your products and services.

Build a custom trained AI model with your products and services

Vizaport AI Chat is a powerful WordPress plugin that brings AI-driven chatbot capabilities to your website. This plugin leverages ChatGPT from OpenAI, allowing users to interact with intelligent chat widgets. Customize the chatbot’s appearance, behavior, and language support to enhance user engagement and provide insightful responses.

When you are ready for the next step, visit Vizaport.com to learn more about building a custom-trained AI, teaching it anything that you want the AI to answer. Or, upgrade to utilize visual and audio AI features that communicate to users in new and unique ways.

Easy to Get Started with AI

Once you have your OpenAI key (see comments below), setup only takes a few minutes. To add your AI chatbot:

  1. Go to the Vizaport Settings page in your WordPress admin menu.
  2. Add your OpenAI key.
  3. Configure the chatbot by setting options such as text, colors, size, and placement.
  4. Test the chatbot and then publish to your web site.

Your OpenAI Key

Vizaport AI Chat utilizes OpenAI, the platform behind ChatGPT. You will need a key from OpenAI before proceeding, unless you have upgraded with Vizaport and have obtained a widget key instead. Go to www.openai.com to obtain the OpenAI key. If you need help to find create a key, see these instructions.

Standard Features

  • Automated human-like conversations
  • Utilizes public Internet data (may be a year old depending on AI model)
  • Chat launcher appears on every page as an icon
  • Chatbot can be customized for text, color and placement

Usage of 3rd Party Service

This plugin utilizes a 3rd party service provided by OpenAI to enhance chat functionality. The plugin communicates with the OpenAI API to generate chat completions, using AI, for user interactions within the chat feature.

Service Details:

  • Service Provider: OpenAI
  • Service Endpoint: api.openai.com/v1/chat/completions
  • Terms of Use: OpenAI Terms of Use
  • Privacy Policy: OpenAI Privacy Policy

Please review the terms of use and privacy policy of OpenAI to understand how your data is handled and transmitted when using this plugin.

Chatbot Upgrades

Go beyond standard chatbots and add advanced features.

  • Custom trained AI models on your products and services
  • Answers questions on up-to-date information
  • Supports voice input and output in addition to text
  • Allows handoff to a live person chat if AI cannot answer
  • Analytics dashboard that tracks usage and responses
  • Does not require an OpenAI key

Visual AI

And when you’re ready for very advanced features, Vizaport’s Visual Widget includes:

  • Natural language queries to plot maps
  • Natural language commands to generate graphs
  • Image viewing and analysis
  • 3D object placement and analysis
  • Plus all the features of the chatbot
sections.screenshots:
1. View of the AI icon when closed on a web page.

  2. View of the AI chatbot when opened and with a user question.

  3. View of the Vizaport Settings in the WordPress admin panel to configure, test and add the AI chatbot.
sections.reviews:
Works Well!

By bigtakeoff on March 26, 2024

I have tried out a bunch of these AI Chat Bots. Many have this issue or that. I found this one by Vizaport really complete and sleek. Works well out the box! Recommended!

Easy to configure and install

By digisy on March 25, 2024

Took a couple of minutes to install on my web site and have a ChatGPT powered chatbot. Already had an OpenAI key, so that part was easy. Went back and customized colors and text afterwards. Also straightforward.
